title: Purple Orchids
description: A piece of paper destroyed me. It was one day... one moment... one letter.One lie.That's all it took to change the course of my life. Now he's back.And he thinks I'm the one who broke him. Someone is lying. And it's not me.But it's not him either. We need to learn to trust again.Sometimes, however, I think trust should be considered a four-letter word.Note to reader: This book is a standalone novel. It is the first in a series that follows three sisters.
author: Samantha Christy
